https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sTDFlmEGonaHdIsTHWsg3WNOerc.jpg It sets in China 1945, a romance develops between the young Ningjing ZHAO (Xun Zhou) and LIN Shuang-Ran, although they are distant cousins ​​and Shuang-Ran is already betrothed. Each will seek to fight against there destiny to try to live each their romantic feelings. A Pinwheel Without Wind
